Who I Am

I am an accomplished instructional designer and web developer with over a decade of experience in creating effective and engaging eLearning solutions. Currently designing online continuing education courses and study resources for allied health professionals at American Medical Technologists, my career spans roles at Piedmont University, the University of Georgia, and as a consultant for various organizations. With a strong educational background, including a Master's in Instructional Design and Development and Ph.D. coursework in Learning Design & Technology, I possess a comprehensive skill set encompassing various design tools, learning management systems, and research methodologies. My expertise in accessibility testing, user experience research, and multimedia communication make me a versatile professional in the field of instructional design and eLearning development.
